channel.title: No response from server? and black screen~~~~~~PLEASE HELP~~~~~~~
channel.description: ok when ever i try to get on to my server ill hit login and the screen will be black then it says connection loss i have to do this about 15 times before it works. Another thing is with my server if you don't connect to right away right when i runserver it will say no response from server. So please help :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 08:53:08 AM[/size][hr]grr this is getting really anoying i can't even log onto my own server

ok when ever i try to get on to my server ill hit login and the screen will be black then it says connection loss i have to do this about 15 times before it works. Another thing is with my server if you don’t connect to right away right when i runserver it will say no response from server. So
please help :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 08:53:08 AM[/size][hr]grr this is getting really anoying i can’t even log onto my own server
